DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T2.CurveId, T1.Seq, T4.value AS SegmentsType, T5.value AS Type, T1.Conventions, T7.CurveId ProjectionCurve, T8.CurveId ProjectionCurveLong, T9.CurveId ProjectionCurveShort, T10.CurveId DiscountCurve, T11.Quote SpotRate, T12.CurveId ProjectionCurveDomestic, T13.CurveId ProjectionCurveForeign, T14.CurveId ReferenceCurve FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurveSegments T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves T2 ON T1.CurveId = T2.CurveId INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesSegmentType T4 ON T1.SegmentsType = T4.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesSegmentTypeType T5 ON T1.Type = T5.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves T7 ON T1.ProjectionCurve = T7.CurveId LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves T8 ON T1.ProjectionCurveLong = T8.CurveId LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves T9 ON T1.ProjectionCurveShort = T9.CurveId LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves T10 ON T1.DiscountCurve = T10.CurveId LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.MdatMarketDataDefinitions T11 ON T1.SpotRate = T11.Quote LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves T12 ON T1.ProjectionCurveDomestic = T12.CurveId LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves T13 ON T1.ProjectionCurveForeign = T13.CurveId LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves T14 ON T1.ReferenceCurve = T14.CurveId ORDER BY 1 ASC, 2 ASC

field.name: *CurveId
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.CurveId,!T!.CurveId lookup FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves !T! ORDER BY CurveId

field.name: *SegmentsType
field.lookup: SELECT value,value SegmentsType FROM ORE.dbo.TypesSegmentType ORDER BY value

field.name: *Type
field.lookup: SELECT value,value Type FROM ORE.dbo.TypesSegmentTypeType ORDER BY value

field.name: *Conventions
field.lookup: SELECT Id Conventions, Id FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsCrossCurrencyBasis UNION SELECT Id, Id FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsFRA UNION SELECT Id, Id FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsOIS UNION SELECT Id, Id FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsSwap UNION SELECT Id, Id FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsTenorBasisSwap UNION SELECT Id, Id FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsTenorBasisTwoSwap UNION SELECT Id, Id FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsZero

field.name: ProjectionCurve
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.CurveId ProjectionCurve,!T!.CurveId FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves !T! ORDER BY CurveId

field.name: ProjectionCurveLong
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.CurveId ProjectionCurveLong,!T!.CurveId FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves !T! ORDER BY CurveId

field.name: ProjectionCurveShort
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.CurveId ProjectionCurveShort,!T!.CurveId FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves !T! ORDER BY CurveId

field.name: DiscountCurve
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.CurveId DiscountCurve,!T!.CurveId FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves !T! ORDER BY CurveId

field.name: SpotRate
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.Quote SpotRate,!T!.Quote FROM ORE.dbo.MdatMarketDataDefinitions !T! ORDER BY Quote

field.name: ProjectionCurveDomestic
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.CurveId ProjectionCurveDomestic,!T!.CurveId FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves !T! ORDER BY CurveId

field.name: ProjectionCurveForeign
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.CurveId ProjectionCurveForeign,!T!.CurveId FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves !T! ORDER BY CurveId

field.name: ReferenceCurve
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.CurveId ReferenceCurve,!T!.CurveId FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationYieldCurves !T! ORDER BY CurveId
